title: League wont download
body: My computer had a virus that made me factory restore but when i try to download league and i double click it to start the launcher nothing happens. Im able to download and run other things just not league??? Any advice is welcome.

replies.body:
It sounds like something with your OS might be blocking the installer from launching.  There may be other factors as well, like making sure that your Windows is totally updated to the most recent version since the restoration.  Double check that update, and that you have necessary windows products available such as [Visual +++](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Once you're up to date, go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that your OS is allowing access for the installer and league to open.  Let me know if you have any questions!
